channel.title: [Faction Suggestion] Vampire
channel.description: > # Dracula > > _**`Vampire Unique Special`**_ > > **Lord Of Vampire** (Passive) - Immune to death at night. > > **Love Bites** (Day) - Cause a player to bleed, they will die in 2 nights unless healed. (3 Uses) > > **New Body** (Day) - You will take over a vampire person’s body, leaving your old one behind. (Infinite Use) > > **Join The Dark Side** (Night) - Attempt to convert a player to the Vampire faction, the player keeps their abilities. [ *1-day cooldown.*] (Infinite Use) > > **Charm** (Night) - Control a player and force them to visit another. You will also see what Class Type to the controlled player is. (3 Uses) > > **Objective:** Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm. > # Vampire > > _**`Vampire ???`**_ > > **Dracula's Servant** (Passive) - If the ghoul dies, the oldest vampire except Dracula becomes the ghoul. > > **Objective:** Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm. > # Ghoul > > _**`Vampire Unique Killer`**_ > > **Thick Skin** (Passive) - Immune to Nightshade poison and bleeding. > > **Hunger For Blood** (Passive) - Blood to survive start with 2 blood, and lose 1 blood every night. If hunger never satisfied, ghoul will suicide. > > **For Blood!** (Night) - Kill a player to drink blood. (Infinite Use) > > **Enrage!** (Night) - Kill a player , cannot be occupy. (2 Uses) > > **Objective:** Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm. > # Vampire King > > _**`Vampire Unique Special`**_ > > **Tenacity** (Passive) - Immune to being occupied at night and immune to target changing. Additionally, your abilities don't count as visits. > > **The Dark Blessing** (Passive) - Immune to death at night once. > >**The Royal Finger** (Day) - The King's next vote for treason will count twice. (Infinite Use) > > **Decide Fate** (Day) - After the final vote, the King can veto the votes and decide if the fate of the person defending themselves. If the King decides to execute, the player on the stand is executed. If the King decides to pardon the player on the stand, they can't be accused of treason again that day. (1 Use) > >**Smell of blood** (Night) - Discover if a player is a member of the Vampire. (3 Use) > > **Objective:** Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm. > # Vampire Hunter > > _**` Blue Dragon Investigative `**_ > > **Vengence** (Passive) - Immune to death once. > > **Holy Temple** (Day) - Make a player conversion immune and death immune tonight. (3 uses) > > **Blood Sampling** (Night) - Determine if a player is a member of Vampire. (Infinite Use) > > **Silver Bullet** (Night) - Kill a vampire player. You must have first discovered that they were a Vampire. > > **Objective:** Defeat the Vampire, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm. Lore: Since before the Throne of Lies era, the hatred cycle between Vampires and Vampire Hunters goes on. The prey and predator keeps adapting to mother nature while us the humans do not know their existence. Who knows when will this end and which faction won the final war.

No limit seem fine, but the Vampire cant discuss at night.

item.title: [Faction Suggestion] Vampire
item.dc:creator: Justforfun
item.description:
Main issue is that should we limit their converts? As it may become another “universe” of Mastermind like faction…

Read full topic

item.title: [Faction Suggestion] Vampire
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Justforfun:

Vengence (Passive) - Immune to death once.

Oh and BD also shouldn’t have autovests(with the exception of king)(And especially not a cop). It detracts from the job of supports, and is a bit OP.

Read full topic

item.title: [Faction Suggestion] Vampire
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Justforfun:

Join The Dark Side (Night) - Attempt to convert a player to the Vampire faction, the player keeps their abilities. [ 1-day cooldown. ] (Infinite Use)

How many members can the faction have?

Justforfun:

Silver Bullet (Night) - Kill a vampire player. You must have first discovered that they were a Vampire.

BD shouldn’t have omniscient killing. Just make Holy Temple an unlimited night ability.

Justforfun:

and death immune tonight.

Why death immune? That’s the job of supports, not investigatives.

Everything else is good.

Read full topic

item.title: [Faction Suggestion] Vampire
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
Possible resuggestion here:

Darcula

Vampire Special

Cursed Blood (Passive) - If you die then all of your Vampire will suidice the following night and Ghoul will no longer need blood to survive.

Vampire Body (Day) - You will take over a vampire, leaving your old body at the end of the night and your old body will show up as vampire’s class that was taken. 3 Use.
(Note: The possess will happen regardless anything will happen to you that night, unless your Vampire is killed)

Mysterious Bite (Night) - Convert a player to Vampire, they will keep their old class ability and be able to saw you and your Ghoul chat and ability target. Infinity Use. 1 Night Cooldown.
(The Vampire will know each other, but cant chat with them at night, although they can still see chat between Darcula and Ghoul.)

Blood Power (Night) - Make you and Ghoul appear as NS to Vampire Hunter. 3 Use

Your Ghoul work just fine, also make the king same as other EK.

Note: This faction have no limit for conversion, they still know who each other are, but they can’t discuss with each other at night, only Darcula and Ghoul can discuss with each other at night.

Vampire Hunter

Uncovertable Unique Blue Dragon Investigator

Holy Sense (Passive) - If a Vampire visited you at night, you will kill them. Can only kill 1 Vampire each night with this passive.

God Bless (Passive) - Vampire cannot kill you at night.

Silver Shield (Day) - If Vampire visited your target tonight, they will die. Can only kill 1 Vampire each night with this ability and the Conversion will also failed. 2 Use

Vampire Check (Night) - Check a player, if they are Vampire you will kill them. Darcula appear as NS for Night 1. Infinity Use.

Read full topic

item.title: [Faction Suggestion] Vampire
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
Vampire class seems boring
Only a Passive, nothing special

Seems like TOS style conversion, which sucked

Blood idea seems cool though

Justforfun:

New Body (Day) - You will take over a vampire person’s body, leaving your old one behind. (Infinite Use)

Make this limited uses, it kinda seems a bit op when you can just possess everyone

Hence the possessor has only 3 uses on Possess

Read full topic

item.title: [Faction Suggestion] Vampire
item.dc:creator: Justforfun
item.description:
Dracula

Vampire Unique Special

Lord Of Vampire (Passive) - Immune to death at night.

Love Bites (Day) - Cause a player to bleed, they will die in 2 nights unless healed. (3 Uses)

New Body (Day) - You will take over a vampire person’s body, leaving your old one behind. (Infinite Use)

Join The Dark Side (Night) - Attempt to convert a player to the Vampire faction, the player keeps their abilities. [ 1-day cooldown.] (Infinite Use)

Charm (Night) - Control a player and force them to visit another. You will also see what Class Type to the controlled player is. (3 Uses)

Objective: Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Vampire

Vampire ???

Dracula’s Servant (Passive) - If the ghoul dies, the oldest vampire except Dracula becomes the ghoul.

Objective: Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Ghoul

Vampire Unique Killer

Thick Skin (Passive) - Immune to Nightshade poison and bleeding.

Hunger For Blood (Passive) - Blood to survive start with 2 blood, and lose 1 blood every night. If hunger never satisfied, ghoul will suicide.

For Blood! (Night) - Kill a player to drink blood. (Infinite Use)

Enrage! (Night) - Kill a player , cannot be occupy. (2 Uses)

Objective: Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Vampire King

Vampire Unique Special

Tenacity (Passive) - Immune to being occupied at night and immune to target changing. Additionally, your abilities don’t count as visits.

The Dark Blessing (Passive) - Immune to death at night once.

The Royal Finger (Day) - The King’s next vote for treason will count twice. (Infinite Use)

Decide Fate (Day) - After the final vote, the King can veto the votes and decide if the fate of the person defending themselves. If the King decides to execute, the player on the stand is executed. If the King decides to pardon the player on the stand, they can’t be accused of treason again that day. (1 Use)

Smell of blood (Night) - Discover if a player is a member of the Vampire. (3 Use)

Objective: Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Vampire Hunter

Blue Dragon Investigative

Vengence (Passive) - Immune to death once.

Holy Temple (Day) - Make a player conversion immune and death immune tonight. (3 uses)

Blood Sampling (Night) - Determine if a player is a member of Vampire. (Infinite Use)

Silver Bullet (Night) - Kill a vampire player. You must have first discovered that they were a Vampire.

Objective: Defeat the Vampire, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Lore: Since before the Throne of Lies era, the hatred cycle between Vampires and Vampire Hunters goes on. The prey and predator keeps adapting to mother nature while us the humans do not know their existence. Who knows when will this end and which faction won the final war.

Read full topic
